description: Make your own tent guylines with this bulk cord. The cord doesn't stretch when it's wet, so you won’t have to get out of the tent to retension it when it rains. Reflective yarns shine in a headlamp, great for children and sleep-addled adults.Made of stretch-free polyester with a tightly woven, braided sheath.Cord is 2mm diameter.3M® reflective yarns in the braid.Sold by the metre.
name: MEC Reflective 2mm Guyline Cord
